item.title: HackTheBox: SecretCorp Writeup
item.description:
üß© Challenge Overview

This challenge involved exploiting a misconfigured web app to gain unauthorized access to internal data.

üîç Enumeration

```bash nmap -sC -sV 10.10.10.10 ``` Discovered ports:

  • 80/tcp ‚Äî HTTP (Apache 2.4.41)
  • 22/tcp ‚Äî SSH (OpenSSH 8.2p1)

üí• Exploitation

During directory fuzzing with `ffuf`, found `/backup.zip`.
Unzipped credentials for `admin:SuperSecure123`.
Login exposed an LFI vulnerability at `index.php?file=…`.

```bash curl “http://target/index.php?file=../../../../etc/passwd” ```

üßë‚Äçüíª Privilege Escalation

After gaining shell access: ```bash linpeas.sh | tee output.txt ``` Found `/usr/local/bin/backup` with SUID bit.
Exploited it via `bash -p` to spawn a root shell.
